name: Katartick
description:
Katartick is a first person shooter game where you have to hunt and kill each target before the time run out.

For that you have at your disposition a grappling hook, a jump boost and you can slow down the time.

Each level have is own best time to beat to have access to the leaderboard who keeps track of the best time.



This game is a test to see if player like the idea, if you do leave a comment or feel free to join the discord server of the game https://discord.gg/gysPPaz .
